blog.title: My short lived contact with the world of VCs in Germany
blog.description: I explore the challenges of transitioning from quantum research to startup entrepreneurship. Valuable lessons about VC funding, deep tech development, and German startup realities.

prevBlog.title: A decentral support button
prevBlog.description: I build a decentralized support button using smart contracts for direct content monetization. Learn how blockchain enables transparent micro-payments without platform intermediaries.

nextBlog.title: Generating AI images, paying anonymously and little
nextBlog.description: I implement anonymous micro-payments for AI image generation using Ethereum Layer-2. See how to connect blockchain payments with serverless AI for sustainable, privacy-focused services.
